title: Community Safety & Awareness Workshop
description: An interactive workshop in collaboration with local police, focusing on building trust, de-escalation techniques, and understanding personal safety. Open to all community members. This session provides a vital opportunity for open dialogue and practical advice in a supportive environment.

title: Youth Mentorship Program Open Day
description: An open day for young people and potential mentors to learn about our new mentorship program. A great opportunity to connect, ask questions, and sign up for a program designed to build confidence and create future leaders.

title: "Discipline & Dialogue" Leadership Seminar
description: A seminar led by Junior Anderson BEM on the core principles of martial arts discipline and how they can be applied to de-escalate conflict and improve communication in leadership roles. Suitable for professionals and community leaders.

title: Annual Community Fundraising Gala
description: Join us for our annual fundraising gala. An evening of celebration, networking, and supporting the future of our community's youth. All proceeds fund our 2027 programs. Black-tie optional.
